trans-unit.source: Provides access to a rich set of OpenType typography properties.
trans-unit.target: 提供对一组丰富的 OpenType 版式属性的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> object exposes the set of features that an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] font supports.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>对象公开的功能集，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字体支持。

trans-unit.source: By setting the properties of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> in markup or code, you can easily author documents that take advantage of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] features.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置的属性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>在标记或代码中，你可以轻松地编写充分利用的文档[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]功能。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps".
trans-unit.target: 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的标准大写字母，其后接样式为“SmallCaps”和“AllSmallCaps”的字母。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the same font size is used for all three words.
trans-unit.target: 本例中，对所有三个单词均使用相同的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本")

trans-unit.source: Text using OpenType capitals
trans-unit.target: 使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本

trans-unit.source: The following markup example shows how to define capitals for the Pescadero font, using properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的标记示例演示如何定义使用的属性的 Pescadero 字体大写字母<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>对象。

trans-unit.source: When the "SmallCaps" format is used, any leading capital letter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用“SmallCaps”格式时会忽略任何前导大写字母。

trans-unit.source: The following code example accomplishes the same task as the previous markup example.
trans-unit.target: 以下代码示例完成与先前的标记事例相同的任务。

trans-unit.source: All dependency properties of this class also have an attached property usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此类的所有依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For instance, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.AnnotationAlternates%2A> property through this syntax: `<`*object*``**Typography.AnnotationAlternates**`="`*value*`".../>`
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.AnnotationAlternates%2A>通过此语法的属性： `<`*对象*``**Typography.AnnotationAlternates** `="` *值*`".../>`

trans-unit.source: The following code sample shows the use typographic <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Capitals%2A> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用排字<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Capitals%2A>中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the variant feature is applied to all text contained with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> element.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，variant 功能将应用于包含的所有文本<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample shows the use typographic <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Capitals%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.NumeralStyle%2A> features in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用排字<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Capitals%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.NumeralStyle%2A>中的功能[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Notice that both typographic properties are applied to the entire paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这两个排字属性将应用于整个段落。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the index of an alternate annotation form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定备用批注格式的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the alternate annotation form.
trans-unit.target: 备用批注格式的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: Annotation forms include glyphs placed in open or solid circles, squares, parentheses, diamonds or rounded boxes.
trans-unit.target: 批注形式包括标志符号放置在打开或实心圆、 正方形、 括号、 菱形或圆角的框。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.AnnotationAlternates%2A> is greater than zero and the selected font does not support annotation alternates, the default form of the letter is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.AnnotationAlternates%2A>大于零和所选字体不支持批注替代项，则显示的字母的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object* **Typography.AnnotationAlternates**="*int*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* **Typography.AnnotationAlternates**="*int*"/>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontCapitals" /> enumerated value that indicates the capital form of the selected font.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontCapitals" /> 枚举值，该值指示所选字体的大写格式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontCapitals" /> enumerated value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontCapitals" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.FontCapitals.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FontCapitals.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Capitals are a set of typographical forms that render text in capital-styled glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 大写字母是一组以大写样式字形呈现文本的版式形式。

trans-unit.source: Typically, when text is rendered as all capitals, the spacing between letters can appear too tight, and the weight and proportion of the letters too heavy.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，当以全大写呈现文本时，字母之间的间距可能看起来很小，字母的权重和比例看起来会很大。

trans-unit.source: OpenType supports a number of styling formats for capitals, including small capitals, petite capitals, titling, and capital spacing.
trans-unit.target: OpenType 大写字母，包括小型大写字母、 小号大写字母、 标题和大写字母间距支持大量的样式设置格式。

trans-unit.source: These styling formats allow you to control the appearance of capitals.
trans-unit.target: 通过这些样式格式可控制大写字母的外观。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps".
trans-unit.target: 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的标准大写字母，其后接样式为“SmallCaps”和“AllSmallCaps”的字母。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the same font size is used for all three words.
trans-unit.target: 本例中，对所有三个单词均使用相同的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of capitals
trans-unit.target: 大写字母的示例

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define capitals for the Pescadero font, using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Capitals%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义 Pescadero 字体，大写字母使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Capitals%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the "SmallCaps" format is used, any leading capital letter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用“SmallCaps”格式时会忽略任何前导大写字母。

trans-unit.source: The following code example accomplishes the same task as the previous markup example.
trans-unit.target: 以下代码示例完成与先前的标记事例相同的任务。

trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.target: \<*object* **Typography.Capitals**="<xref:System.Windows.FontCapitals>"/>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether inter-glyph spacing for all-capital text is globally adjusted to improve readability.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是否全局调整所有全大写文本的内部标志符号间距以提高可读性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if spacing is adjusted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果调整间距，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Capital spacing is a feature that allows you to provide more spacing when using all capitals in text.
trans-unit.target: 大写字母间距功能让你可以在使用全大写字母文本时提供更宽的间距。

trans-unit.source: Capital letters are typically designed to blend with lowercase letters.
trans-unit.target: 大写字母通常设计为与小写字母混合使用。

trans-unit.source: Spacing that appears attractive between and a capital letter and a lowercase letter may look too tight when all capital letters are used.
trans-unit.target: 大写字母和小写字母之间看起来比较美观的间距在使用全大写字母时可能会显得过紧。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays normal and capital spacing for the Pescadero font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的普通间距和大写字母间距。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType capital spacing](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "Text using OpenType capital spacing")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 大写字母间距的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "使用 OpenType 大写字母间距的文本")

trans-unit.target: 普通字母和大写字母间距的示例

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether glyphs adjust their vertical position to better align with uppercase glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是否调整标志符号的垂直位置以更好地与大写标志符号对齐。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the vertical position is adjusted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果调整垂直位置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Random contextual alternates provide multiple substitute glyphs for a single character.
trans-unit.target: 随机备用连接形式为单个字符提供多种备用字形。

trans-unit.source: When implemented with script-type fonts, this feature can simulate handwriting by using of a set of randomly chosen glyphs with slight differences in appearance.
trans-unit.target: 实现脚本类型字体时，此功能可通过使用一组随机选择的外观稍有差异的字形来模拟手写内容。

trans-unit.source: The following text uses random contextual alternates for the Lindsey font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本使用 Lindsey 字体的随机备用连接形式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the letter "a" varies slightly in appearance
trans-unit.target: 请注意字母“a”外观稍有变化

trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 随机上下文替代项的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont23.gif "使用 OpenType 随机上下文替代项的文本")

trans-unit.source: Contextual ligatures are designed to enhance readability by providing better joining behavior between the characters that make up the ligature.
trans-unit.target: 上下文连字旨在通过提供更好的联接构成连字的字符之间的行为来提高可读性。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.ContextualLigatures%2A> is `true` and the selected font does not support contextual ligatures, the default form of the letter is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.ContextualLigatures%2A>是`true`和选定的字体不支持上下文连字，则显示的字母的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: Certain combinations of swash glyphs can cause an unattractive appearance, such as overlapping descenders on adjacent letters.
trans-unit.target: 花体字形的某些组合可能导致文本外观欠佳，例如相邻字母的下行处出现重叠。

trans-unit.source: Using a contextual swash allows you to use a substitute swash glyph that produces a better appearance.
trans-unit.target: 通过连接形式花体，可使用能生成更佳外观的替代花体字形。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontFraction" /> 枚举值，该值指示分数的样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontFraction" /> enumerated value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontFraction" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.FontFraction.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FontFraction.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: OpenType fonts support styles for fractions, including slashed and stacked.
trans-unit.target: OpenType 字体支持分数，包括前面带有斜线和堆积样式。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays fraction styles for the Palatino Linotype font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的分数样式。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType slashed and stacked fractions](~/add/media/opentypefont12.gif "Text using OpenType slashed and stacked fractions")
trans-unit.target: ![文本使用 OpenType 横式分数和竖式](~/add/media/opentypefont12.gif "文本使用 OpenType 横式分数和竖式")

trans-unit.source: Example of slashed and stacked fraction styles
trans-unit.target: 前面带有斜线和堆积分数样式的示例

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define fraction styles for the Palatino Linotype font, using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Fraction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义使用字体的分数样式使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Fraction%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object* **Typography.Fraction**="<xref:System.Windows.FontFraction>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* **Typography.Fraction**="<xref:System.Windows.FontFraction>"/>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether historical forms are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是否启用历史记录格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if historical forms are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用历史记录格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Historical forms are typographic conventions that were common in the past.
trans-unit.target: 历史形式指过去常见的版式约定。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays the phrase, "Boston, Massachusetts", using an historical form of glyphs for the Palatino Linotype font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本使用 Palatino Linotype 字体的一种历史字形形式显示短语“Boston, Massachusetts”。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType historical forms](~/add/media/opentypefont10.gif "Text using OpenType historical forms")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 历史形式的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont10.gif "使用 OpenType 历史形式的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of historical forms
trans-unit.target: 历史形式的示例

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define historical forms for the Palatino Linotype font, using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.HistoricalForms%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义使用字体的历史形式使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.HistoricalForms%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object* **Typography.HistoricalForms**="*bool*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* **Typography.HistoricalForms**="*bool*"/>

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether historical ligatures are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用历史记录连字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if historical ligatures are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用历史记录连字，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.

trans-unit.source: Historical ligatures are typographic forms used in historical typography that font designers may add to their fonts.
trans-unit.target: 历史连字是采用字体设计器可能会添加到其字体的历史版式的排字窗体。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether kerning is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用字距调整。

trans-unit.source: Kerning is a typographic function that adjusts the spacing between characters to enhance word shape.
trans-unit.target: 字距调整是调整字符用于改善单词形状之间的间距的排字函数。

trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Kerning" /> 附加属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether standard typographic font forms of Greek glyphs have been replaced with corresponding font forms commonly used in mathematical notation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用在数学符号中常用的相应字体格式替换希腊语标志符号的标准版式字体格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if mathematical Greek forms are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用数学希腊语格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.MathematicalGreek%2A> is `true` and the selected font does not support mathematical Greek forms, the default form of the letter is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.MathematicalGreek%2A>是`true`和选定的字体不支持数学希腊语窗体，则显示的字母的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object* **Typography.MethematicalGreek**="*bool*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* **Typography.MethematicalGreek**="*bool*"/>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontNumeralAlignment" /> enumerated value that indicates the alighnment of widths when using numerals.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontNumeralAlignment" /> 枚举值，该值指示使用数字时的宽度对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontNumeralAlignment" /> enumerated value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontNumeralAlignment" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.FontNumeralAlignment.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FontNumeralAlignment.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: OpenType fonts support a proportional and tabular figure feature to control the alignment of widths when using numerals.
trans-unit.target: OpenType 字体支持按比例和表格图功能，以使用数字时控制宽度的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Proportional figures treat each numeral as having a different width—"1" is narrower than "5".
trans-unit.target: 比例数字将每个数字视为具有不同的宽度—“1”窄于“5”。

trans-unit.source: Tabular figures are treated as equal-width numerals so that they align vertically, which increases the readability of financial type information.
trans-unit.target: 表格式数字被视为宽度相等的数字，因此它们可垂直对齐，从而增强财务类型信息的可读性。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays two proportional figures in the first column using the Miramonte font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本使用 Miramonte 字体显示第一列中的两个表格式数字。

trans-unit.source: Note the difference in width between the numerals "5" and "1".
trans-unit.target: 请注意数字“5”和“1”之间的宽度差异。

trans-unit.source: The second column shows the same two numeric values with the widths adjusted by using the tabular figure feature.
trans-unit.target: 第二列显示相同的两个数值，并通过使用表格式数字功能调整其宽度。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 比例和表格式数字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "使用 OpenType 比例和表格式数字的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of proportional and tabbed figures
trans-unit.target: 比例和选项卡式数字示例

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define proportional and tabular figures for the Miramonte font, using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.NumeralAlignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义 Miramonte 字体的比例和表格数字使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.NumeralAlignment%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object* **Typography.NumericalAlignment**="<xref:System.Windows.FontNumeralAlignment>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* **Typography.NumericalAlignment**="<xref:System.Windows.FontNumeralAlignment>"/>

trans-unit.source: OpenType fonts support an old style numeral format.
trans-unit.target: OpenType 字体支持旧样式的数字格式。

trans-unit.source: This format is useful for displaying numerals in styles that are no longer standard.
trans-unit.target: 此格式对于显示不再是标准样式的数字非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays an 18th century date in standard and old style numeral formats for the Palatino Linotype font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本以 Palatino Linotype 字体的标准和旧样式数字格式显示 18 世纪日期。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType old style numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "Text using OpenType old style numerals")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 旧样式数字文本](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "使用 OpenType 旧样式数字的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of standard and old style numerals
trans-unit.target: 标准和旧样式数字的示例

trans-unit.source: The following text displays standard numerals for the Palatino Linotype font, followed by old style numerals.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的标准数字，后跟旧样式数字。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType old style numeral sets](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "Text using OpenType old style numeral sets")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 旧样式数字集的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "使用 OpenType 旧样式数字集的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of standard and old style numeral sets
trans-unit.target: 标准和旧样式数字集的示例

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a nominal zero font form should be replaced with a slashed zero.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用斜杠零替换标称零字体格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if slashed zero forms are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用斜杠零格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: OpenType fonts support a slashed zero numeral format to emphasize the difference between the letter "O" and the numeral "0".
trans-unit.target: OpenType 字体支持前面带有斜线零数字格式以强调"O"的字母和数字"0"之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: The slashed zero numeral is often used for identifiers in financial and business information.
trans-unit.target: 斜线零数字通常用于财务和商务信息中的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays a sample order identifier using the Miramonte font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本显示使用 Miramonte 字体的订单标识符。

trans-unit.source: The first line uses standard numerals.
trans-unit.target: 第一行使用标准数字。

trans-unit.source: The second line used slashed zero numerals to provide better contrast with the uppercase "O" letter.
trans-unit.target: 第二行使用斜线零数字，以便更易于与大写字母“O”进行区分。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals")
trans-unit.target: ![文本使用 OpenType 斜线零数字](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "文本使用 OpenType 斜线零数字")

trans-unit.source: Example of slashed zero numerals
trans-unit.target: 斜线零数字的示例

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define slashed zero numerals for the Miramonte font, using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.SlashedZero%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义斜线零数字 Miramonte 字体使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.SlashedZero%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.SlashedZero%2A> is `true` and the selected font does not support slashed zero forms, the default form of the numeral is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.SlashedZero%2A>是`true`和选定的字体不支持斜杠零格式，则显示的数字的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object* **Typography.SlashedZero**="*bool*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* **Typography.SlashedZero**="*bool*"/>

trans-unit.source: The following text displays standard ligature glyphs for the Pericles font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本显示 Pericles 字体的标准连字字形。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of standard set of ligatures
trans-unit.target: 连字的标准集示例

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define standard ligature glyphs for the Pericles font, using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.StandardLigatures%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义标准连字的 Pericles 字体的标志符号使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.StandardLigatures%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, OpenTypes fonts in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] enable standard ligatures.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，OpenTypes 中存在多种字体[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]启用标准连字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you use the Palatino Linotype font, the standard ligatures "fi", "ff", and "fl" appear as a combined character glyph.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用 Palatino Linotype 字体，则标准连字“fi”、“ff”和“fl”显示为组合字符字形。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the pair of characters for each standard ligature touch each other.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，每个标准连字的字符对之间彼此相连。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of standard ligatures enabled by default
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下启用的标准连字的示例

trans-unit.source: However, you can disable standard ligature features so that a standard ligature such as "ff" displays as two separate glyphs, rather than as a combined character glyph.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可禁用标准连字功能，从而使“ff”等标准连字显示为两个单独的字形，而不显示为一个组合字符字形。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures")
trans-unit.target: ![文本使用禁用的 OpenType 标准连字](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "文本使用禁用的 OpenType 标准连字")

trans-unit.source: Example of disabled standard ligatures
trans-unit.target: 已禁用的标准连字的示例

trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.StandardLigatures%2A>是`true`和选定的字体不支持标准连字，则显示的字母的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: Swashes are decorative glyphs that use elaborate ornamentation often associated with calligraphy.
trans-unit.target: 花体是使用精美修饰的装饰性字形，通常与书法相关。

trans-unit.target: 标准和花体字形的示例

trans-unit.source: Swashes are often used as decorative elements in short phrases such as event announcements.
trans-unit.target: 花体通常用作事件公告等简短文章中的修饰元素。

trans-unit.source: The following text uses swashes to emphasize the capital letters of the name of the event.

trans-unit.target: 在样式集的标志符号可能用于协调视觉效果、 以特定方式进行交互或采用其他方式协同工作。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用字体格式的样式集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylistic set of the font form is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用字体格式的样式集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Some fonts contain stylistic variant glyphs that correspond to portions of a character set.
trans-unit.target: 某些字体包含样式 variant 的标志符号对应字符集的部分。

trans-unit.source: Glyphs in stylistic sets may be designed to harmonize visually, interact in particular ways, or work together in other ways.
trans-unit.target: 在样式集的标志符号可能用于协调视觉效果、 以特定方式进行交互或采用其他方式协同工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontVariants" /> enumerated value that indicates a variation of the standard typographic form to be used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontVariants" /> 枚举值，该值指示使用的标准版式格式的变体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontVariants" /> enumerated value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontVariants" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.FontVariants.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FontVariants.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography> class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置一个值，在拥有的对象上`Typography`属性，它是只能访问<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography>类实例。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象的一种附加的属性使用，因此它可以包含文本的设置此属性支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Variants are similar to superscript or subscript font forms.
trans-unit.target: 变体都类似于上标或下标字体窗体。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a font form to contain differing glyph sets between superscript and the ordinal form, or between subscript and inferior forms.
trans-unit.target: 很可能包含不同的标志符号集之间上标和序号窗体中，下标和下级格式之间或字体窗体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Variants%2A> property allows you to set superscript and subscript values for an OpenType font.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Variants%2A>属性允许您为 OpenType 字体设置上标和下标的值。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays superscripts for the Palatino Linotype font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的上标。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType superscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "Text using OpenType superscripts")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 上标的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "使用 OpenType 上标的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of superscripts
trans-unit.target: 上标的示例

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define superscripts for the Palatino Linotype font, using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Variants%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义使用字体上标使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Variants%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following text displays subscripts for the Palatino Linotype font.
trans-unit.target: 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的下标。

trans-unit.source: ![Text using OpenType subscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "Text using OpenType subscripts")
trans-unit.target: ![使用 OpenType 下标的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "使用 OpenType 下标的文本")

trans-unit.source: Example of subscripts
trans-unit.target: 下标的示例

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define subscripts for the Palatino Linotype font, using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Variants%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义使用字体的下标使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Variants%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Fonts that do not support variants may have an algorithmic approximation of the font form.
trans-unit.target: 不支持变体的字体可能具有字体窗体的算法近似值。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.target: \<*object* **Typography.Variants**="<xref:System.Windows.FontVariants>"/>
